metadata.title: CVE-2019-20397 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A double-free is present in libyang before v1.0-r1 in the function yyparse() when an organization field is not terminated. Applications that use libyang to parse untrusted input yang files may be vulnerable to this flaw, which would cause a crash or potentially code execution.

criterions.comment: libyang package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
